title: Session 01 — Trouble in Bryn Shander
body:
# Recap

The party arrived in **Bryn Shander** during heavy snow. Rumors mentioned giants harassing the Ten-Towns.

### Key Events
- Met Sheriff *Markham Southwell* and Speaker *Duvessa Shane*.
- A frost giant scouting party searched for *Artus Cimber*.
- Party defended the walls; townsfolk thankful.

### Hooks
- Follow leads on **Artus Cimber**.
- Seek out the wandering giant ally **Harshnag**.

title: Harshnag the Grim (NPC)
body:
A battle-hardened **frost giant** who opposes the Ordning's chaos.

- Favors mortals who stand against monstrous giants.
- Often roams the **Spine of the World**.
- Can guide the party to the **Eye of the All-Father**.

title: Zephyros (NPC)
body:
An eccentric **cloud giant** wizard who aids smallfolk from his flying tower, offering cryptic guidance about the shattered **Ordning**.

- Usually ferries the party between key locations.
- Seeks a peaceful path to restore giantkind.

title: King Hekaton (NPC)
body:
Missing **storm giant** king of the **Wyrmskull Throne**. His disappearance triggers the giants’ power scramble.

- Finding him is central to resolving the crisis.
- Values justice and the balance among giant kindreds.

title: Queen Neri (NPC)
body: Beloved **storm giant** queen whose death deepens the royal turmoil. Her loss fuels rivalries among Hekaton’s daughters.

title: Princess Serissa (NPC)
body: Youngest daughter of Hekaton, acting regent of **Maelstrom**. Sincere and just, she seeks outside heroes to uncover the court’s corruption.

title: Princess Mirran (NPC)
body: Ambitious elder princess of the storm giants, locked in rivalry for the throne.

title: Princess Nym (NPC)
body: Cunning elder princess of the storm giants; often aligned with Mirran’s schemes.

title: Iymrith (NPC)
body: An **ancient blue dragon** who manipulates events under a giant guise, sowing discord within the storm giant court.

title: Countess Sansuri (NPC)
body: Vainglorious **cloud giant** ruler of Lyn Armaal. Seeks lost **dragon magic** and ancient Ostorian secrets to elevate her station.

title: Duke Zalto (NPC)
body: War‑minded **fire giant** duke forging the **Vonindod** from scattered fragments to dominate the North.

title: Jarl Storvald (NPC)
body: Ruthless **frost giant** jarl who hunts the **Ring of Winter** and leads raids from the Sea of Moving Ice.

title: Thane Kayalithica (NPC)
body: Austere **stone giant** leader whose isolationist dogma threatens smallfolk settlements across the frontier.

title: Augrek Brighthelm (NPC)
body: Cheery dwarf **deputy** of Bryn Shander’s southwest gate; loyal to Sheriff Southwell and protective of the town.

title: Sirac of Suzail (NPC)
body: Acolyte of **Torm** with a mysterious heritage; tied to **Artus Cimber**. Resides in Icewind Dale.

title: Markham Southwell (NPC)
body: Stoic **sheriff** of Bryn Shander; measures people by deeds and prioritizes the Dale’s safety.

title: Duvessa Shane (NPC)
body: Young **Town Speaker** of Bryn Shander—sharp, determined, and fluent in northern politics.

title: Beldora (NPC)
body: Street‑savvy **Harper** who trades in whispers and keeps Icewind Dale’s folk under her watch.

title: Sir Baric Nylef (NPC)
body: Knight of the **Order of the Gauntlet** hunting the brigand Worvil ‘The Weevil’ Forkbeard in the North.

title: Shalvus Martholio (NPC)
body: A smiling **shepherd** and Zhentarim agent embedded in **Goldenfields**, eager to climb the Black Network’s ranks.

title: Zi Liang (NPC)
body: Disciplined Goldenfields defender with a fierce sense of duty to the temple‑farm and its people.

title: Miros Xelbrin (NPC)
body: Gregarious Goldenfields **showman** and tavern regular; stronger than he looks and quick to help.

title: Naxene Drathkala (NPC)
body: Pragmatic **Harper** mage stationed in Goldenfields; studies dragons and counsels against giant threats.

title: Darz Helgar (NPC)
body: World‑worn rogue turned stablehand in **Triboar**; survival first, but not without a conscience.

title: Darathra Shendrel (NPC)
body: Capable **Lords’ Alliance** agent and protector of Triboar; steady in a crisis.

title: Narth Tezrin (NPC)
body: Shopkeeper‑adventurer with big dreams; partners with Alaestra in Triboar’s trading scene.

title: Urgala Meltimer (NPC)
body: No‑nonsense former mercenary who runs the **Northshield House** in Triboar; fiercely protective of locals.

title: Ghelryn Foehammer (NPC)
body: Proud **shield dwarf** smith of Triboar; values craft, honor, and the town’s defense.

title: Othovir (NPC)
body: Leatherworker of Triboar with ties he’d rather keep quiet; gets dragged into the giants’ attack.

title: Nestra Ruthiol (NPC)
body: Pragmatic **Waterbaron** of **Yartar** balancing city politics, merchants, and shadowy pressures.

title: Lord Drylund (NPC)
body: Smooth‑talking Yartar noble whose gambling boat hides dangerous secrets tied to Hekaton’s fate.

title: Location — Eye of the All-Father
body:
Ancient giant temple hidden in the mountains.

- Houses the oracle of **Annam**.
- Answers questions when proper rites are observed.
- Crucial to understanding the **Ordning** upheaval.

title: House Rule — Critical Hits
body: **Crits:** Roll damage dice twice (`2d`) + modifiers once. Brutal Critical features add extra dice after doubling.

title: Faction — Harpers
body: A semi-secret network promoting equality and opposing tyranny. Potential patrons or quest-givers in the North.

Learn properties and attunement of a magic item, or which spell affects a creature/object.

body:

Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft

All nonmagical food and drink in a 5‑ft radius sphere centered on a point of your choice is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Suppress strong emotions in a 20‑ft-radius sphere; can end charm or make targets indifferent for the duration.

title: Continual Flame
body:
# Continual Flame (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (ruby dust worth 50 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Create a flame that burns without heat or fuel; it can't be extinguished and sheds normal light.

title: Darkness
body:
# Darkness (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,M (bat fur and pitch)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Magical darkness fills a 15‑ft-radius sphere; nonmagical light can't illuminate it; darkvision can't see through it.

title: Darkvision
body:
# Darkvision (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (bit of fur and a drop of ink)
Duration: 8 hours

Give a willing creature 60‑ft darkvision for the duration.

title: Detect Thoughts
body:
# Detect Thoughts (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (copper piece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Read surface thoughts; probe deeper with a Wis save; can search for minds within 30 ft.

title: Enhance Ability
body:
# Enhance Ability (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (fur or feather)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Give a creature advantage on checks for one ability; some modes grant extra benefits (e.g., +2d6 temp carry cap).

title: Find Traps
body:
# Find Traps (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

You sense the presence of traps within line of sight, but not their exact location or how to disable them.

title: Flaming Sphere
body:
# Flaming Sphere (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (tallow, brimstone, powdered iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A 5‑ft-diameter sphere of fire appears; ram it as a bonus action; 2d6 fire (Dex save half).

title: Gentle Repose
body:
# Gentle Repose (2nd-level necromancy, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (salt and copper piece)
Duration: 10 days

Protects a corpse from decay and prevents it from becoming undead; extends time limits on raising the target.

title: Gust of Wind
body:
# Gust of Wind (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (60‑ft line)
Components: V,S,M (legumes)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A strong line of wind pushes creatures, disperses gas, and makes movement against it difficult terrain.

title: Heat Metal
body:
# Heat Metal (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (iron and flame)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Cause a manufactured metal object to glow red-hot; 2d8 fire damage and disadvantage on attacks/ability checks while holding/wearing it.

title: Hold Person
body:
# Hold Person (2nd-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small piece of straight iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or paralyzed (humanoid). Target repeats save at end of each turn; more targets with higher slots.

title: Invisibility
body:
# Invisibility (2nd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (eyelash encased in gum arabic)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A creature becomes invisible until it attacks or casts a spell; equipment carried is invisible as well.

title: Knock
body:
# Knock (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Opens a locked, barred, or stuck object; suppresses Arcane Lock for 10 minutes.

title: Levitate
body:
# Levitate (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small leather loop or piece of golden wire)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

One creature/object rises and can move vertically; push/pull along surfaces to move horizontally.

title: Lesser Restoration
body:
# Lesser Restoration (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End one disease or one condition: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

title: Locate Object
body:
# Locate Object (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (forked twig)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense direction to a familiar object within 1,000 ft; blocked by lead or running water (per DM).

title: Magic Weapon
body:
# Magic Weapon (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A nonmagical weapon becomes +1 (increases with higher slots).

title: Mirror Image
body:
# Mirror Image (2nd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create three illusory duplicates that make you harder to hit; d20 check to determine if an attack targets a duplicate.

title: Pass without Trace
body:
# Pass without Trace (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A veil of shadows grants +10 to Stealth checks and prevents tracking except by magical means.

title: Prayer of Healing
body:
# Prayer of Healing (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Up to six creatures regain 2d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more at higher slots).

title: Protection from Poison
body:
# Protection from Poison (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Neutralizes one poison affecting the target; gives advantage on saves vs poison and resistance to poison damage.

title: Rope Trick
body:
# Rope Trick (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (powdered corn extract and twisted loop of parchment)
Duration: 1 hour

A rope rises and hangs; an extradimensional space opens at the top that fits up to eight Medium creatures.

title: Scorching Ray
body:
# Scorching Ray (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Create three rays of fire; make a ranged spell attack for each (2d6 fire each). More rays at higher slots.

title: See Invisibility
body:
# See Invisibility (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (pinch of talc and powdered silver)
Duration: 1 hour

You can see invisible creatures and objects, as well as into the Ethereal Plane within 10 ft.

title: Shatter
body:
# Shatter (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (a chip of mica)
Duration: Instant

A sudden loud ringing noise; Con save or 3d8 thunder in a 10‑ft radius sphere (disadvantage for inorganic material).

title: Silence
body:
# Silence (2nd-level illusion, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create a 20‑ft-radius sphere of silence; no sound can be created or pass through; creatures are deafened within.

title: Spider Climb
body:
# Spider Climb (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (bit of spiderweb)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

The target can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check; gains 30‑ft climb speed.

title: Spiritual Weapon
body:
# Spiritual Weapon (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create a floating spectral weapon; bonus‑action attack for 1d8 + modifier force damage (more at higher slots).

title: Suggestion
body:
# Suggestion (2nd-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,M (snake’s tongue and honeycomb or drop of sweet oil)
Duration: Concentration, up to 8 hours

Influence a creature with a reasonable course of activity; Wis save negates; ends if you or your companions damage it.

title: Warding Bond
body:
# Warding Bond (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp each, worn by you and target)
Duration: 1 hour

You and the target gain +1 AC and saves, resistance to all damage; you take the same damage the target takes.

title: Web
body:
# Web (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of spiderweb)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Thick, sticky webs fill a 20‑ft cube; area is difficult terrain; Dex save or restrained (Str check to break, or fire burns webs).

title: Animate Dead
body:
# Animate Dead (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of blood, flesh, and bone)
Duration: Instant

Create or reassert control over skeletons or zombies. At higher slots, animate more undead.

title: Beacon of Hope
body:
# Beacon of Hope (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Choose any creatures; they have advantage on Wis saves and death saves, and regain max HP from healing.

title: Bestow Curse
body:
# Bestow Curse (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or target suffers a chosen effect: disadvantage on checks/saves, vulnerability, wasted turn, or DM options.

title: Blink
body:
# Blink (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

At end of each turn, roll d20; on 11+, you vanish into the Ethereal Plane until your next turn, reappearing in same/different spot.

title: Call Lightning
body:
# Call Lightning (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Storm cloud appears; each turn, call down a lightning bolt (Dex save or 3d10 lightning).

title: Clairvoyance
body:
# Clairvoyance (3rd-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 1 mile
Components: V,S,M (focus worth 100 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create invisible sensor to hear or see a location within range, familiar or obvious.

title: Conjure Animals
body:
# Conjure Animals (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Summon fey spirits as beasts: 2 of CR 1, 4 of CR 1/2, 8 of CR 1/4, or 16 of CR 1/8.

title: Dispel Magic
body:
# Dispel Magic (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End spell of 3rd level or lower. For higher, ability check against DC 10 + spell’s level.

title: Fear
body:
# Fear (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (30-ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (white feather or heart)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Creatures in cone Wis save or drop items and run away (Dash each turn).

title: Fly
body:
# Fly (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (wing feather)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Creature touched gains 60-ft fly speed for duration.

title: Gaseous Form
body:
# Gaseous Form (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (gauze and smoke)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Creature becomes a misty cloud with resistances and ability to pass through small openings.

title: Haste
body:
# Haste (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (licorice root)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target doubles speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dex saves, extra action each turn; lethargy afterward.

title: Hypnotic Pattern
body:
# Hypnotic Pattern (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: S,M (incense, crystal rod)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

30-ft cube pattern; Wis save or become charmed/incapacitated with speed 0.

title: Lightning Bolt
body:
# Lightning Bolt (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (100-ft line)
Components: V,S,M (fur and rod of amber)
Duration: Instant

Line of lightning 100x5 ft; Dex save or 8d6 lightning damage.

title: Major Image
body:
# Major Image (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fleece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create image with sound, smell, temperature; 20-ft cube size; Investigation check reveals.

title: Remove Curse
body:
# Remove Curse (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End all curses on target; also ends attunement to cursed items.

title: Revivify
body:
# Revivify (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamonds worth 300 gp)
Duration: Instant

Touch creature that died within last minute; it returns to life with 1 HP.

title: Sending
body:
# Sending (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Unlimited
Components: V,S,M (short fine copper wire)
Duration: 1 round

Send a 25-word message to a creature; it can reply. If on another plane, 5% chance message fails.

title: Sleet Storm
body:
# Sleet Storm (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of dust, drops of water, pinch of ice)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

40-ft radius, 20-ft tall cylinder of sleet; heavily obscures, difficult terrain, Dex saves vs falling.

title: Speak with Dead
body:
# Speak with Dead (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S,M (burning incense)
Duration: 10 minutes

Grant semblance of life to a corpse; ask it 5 questions; may be cryptic and knows what it knew in life.

title: Banishment
body:
# Banishment (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (item distasteful to target)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Cha save or banish target to harmless demiplane (native creatures) or to native plane (extraplanar).

title: Blight
body:
# Blight (4th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Necrotic energy drains vitality; Con save or 8d8 necrotic damage (plants disadvantaged or instantly killed if nonmagical).

title: Confusion
body:
# Confusion (4th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (3 walnut shells)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Creatures in 10-ft radius sphere must Wis save or act randomly each turn.

title: Conjure Minor Elementals
body:
# Conjure Minor Elementals (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Summon elementals of CR 2 or lower; more at higher slots.

title: Control Water
body:
# Control Water (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of water and dust)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Control floods, part water, redirect flow, or whirlpool within a 100-ft cube.

title: Death Ward
body:
# Death Ward (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: 8 hours

If target drops to 0 HP, instead drops to 1. Also ignores first effect that would kill target instantly.

title: Dimension Door
body:
# Dimension Door (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 500 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Teleport yourself and one willing creature within 500 ft to a space you can visualize or describe.

title: Divination
body:
# Divination (4th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense and sacrificial offering worth 25 gp)
Duration: Instant

Ask a single question about a goal/event/activity within 7 days; DM gives truthful reply.

title: Fabricate
body:
# Fabricate (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Convert raw materials into products (e.g., wood to bridge). Must be same material and volume.

title: Fire Shield
body:
# Fire Shield (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (bit of phosphorus or firefly)
Duration: 10 minutes

Sheath of cold or fire surrounds you; attackers take 2d8 cold or fire damage when hitting you; you gain resistance to chosen damage.

title: Freedom of Movement
body:
# Freedom of Movement (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (leather strap bound around arm)
Duration: 1 hour

Target ignores difficult terrain, paralysis, restraint, underwater penalties.

title: Greater Invisibility
body:
# Greater Invisibility (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target becomes invisible until spell ends, even if attacking or casting.

title: Guardian of Faith
body:
# Guardian of Faith (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: 8 hours

Large spectral guardian appears; hostile creatures that move within 10 ft must make Dex save or take 20 radiant damage (half on save). Disappears after 60 damage dealt.

title: Hallucinatory Terrain
body:
# Hallucinatory Terrain (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (stone, twig, bit of green plant)
Duration: 24 hours

Make terrain look, sound, and smell like another sort of terrain. Investigation check reveals it.

title: Ice Storm
body:
# Ice Storm (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of dust and few drops of water)
Duration: Instant

20-ft radius, 40-ft high cylinder; 2d8 bludgeoning + 4d6 cold damage (Dex save half); area becomes difficult terrain.

title: Locate Creature
body:
# Locate Creature (4th-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (bit of fur from bloodhound)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Sense direction of specific creature within 1,000 ft; blocked by running water or lead.

title: Phantasmal Killer
body:
# Phantasmal Killer (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target makes Wis save or becomes frightened; takes 4d10 psychic damage each turn until save ends.

title: Polymorph
body:
# Polymorph (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (caterpillar cocoon)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Transform creature into beast of CR <= target’s level. HP becomes that of new form.

title: Stoneskin
body:
# Stoneskin (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, slashing.

title: Wall of Fire
body:
# Wall of Fire (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (small piece of phosphorus)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Create wall of fire (60 ft long, 20 ft high, 1 ft thick or circle 20 ft diameter). One side deals 5d8 fire damage (Dex save half).

title: Cloudkill
body:
# Cloudkill (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Creates a moving 20-ft-radius cloud of poison. Con save or 5d8 poison damage. Moves 10 ft away from you each round.

title: Cone of Cold
body:
# Cone of Cold (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (60-ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (small crystal or glass cone)
Duration: Instant

Creatures in cone make Con save or take 8d8 cold damage (half on save).

title: Commune
body:
# Commune (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense and vial of holy or unholy water)
Duration: 1 minute

Ask your deity 3 yes/no questions. DM gives correct answers (may be unclear for future events).

title: Commune with Nature
body:
# Commune with Nature (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

You become one with nature; gain knowledge of terrain, plants, minerals, bodies of water, people, or presence of powerful creatures within 3 miles (300 ft underground).

title: Contact Other Plane
body:
# Contact Other Plane (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: 1 minute

Mentally contact extraplanar entity. Int save or take 6d6 psychic damage and insanity for 1 minute. On success, you can ask 5 questions and receive correct answers.

title: Dispel Evil and Good
body:
# Dispel Evil and Good (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Protective aura. Attacks against fiends, undead, and celestials are at disadvantage. You can also end enchantments, banish extraplanar creatures, or suppress effects.

title: Dominate Person
body:
# Dominate Person (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or you charm a humanoid. You have control of its actions, and it obeys your commands. New save at end of each turn.

title: Dream
body:
# Dream (5th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Unlimited
Components: V,S,M (handful of sand, ink, quill)
Duration: 8 hours

Shape another creature’s dreams. Messenger can deliver message, appear monstrous, and cause psychic damage if target fails Wis save.

title: Flame Strike
body:
# Flame Strike (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of sulfur)
Duration: Instant

A 10-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder of fire and radiant energy. Dex save or 4d6 fire + 4d6 radiant (half on save).

title: Geas
body:
# Geas (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: 30 days

Command a creature to carry out a service or refrain from an action. Wis save negates. On a fail, the creature takes 5d10 psychic damage each time it disobeys.

title: Greater Restoration
body:
# Greater Restoration (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
Duration: Instant

End one debilitating effect: exhaustion level, charm, petrification, curse, attunement to cursed item, or one reduction to ability scores or HP max.

title: Hallow
body:
# Hallow (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 24 hours
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (herbs, oils, incense worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Area becomes magically hallowed. Can bind extra effects (e.g., daylight, fear, immunity to charm).

title: Hold Monster
body:
# Hold Monster (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target creature (any) must Wis save or be paralyzed. Repeat save at end of each turn.

title: Insect Plague
body:
# Insect Plague (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (grains of sugar, fat, and a drop of water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

20-ft-radius sphere swarms with biting locusts. Con save or take 4d10 piercing damage. Area is difficult terrain.

title: Legend Lore
body:
# Legend Lore (5th-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense worth 250 gp, 4 ivory strips worth 50 gp each)
Duration: Instant

Bring to mind legends about a person, place, or object. The more specific the knowledge, the more precise the lore.

title: Mass Cure Wounds
body:
# Mass Cure Wounds (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Up to six creatures regain 3d8 + spellcasting modifier HP (more when cast at higher slots).

title: Mislead
body:
# Mislead (5th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

You become invisible while an illusory double appears. You can move the double and see/hear through it.

title: Modify Memory
body:
# Modify Memory (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target Wis save or charmed for the duration. You can alter memory of an event within last 24 hours (longer at higher slots).

title: Passwall
body:
# Passwall (5th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (sesame seeds)
Duration: 1 hour

Open a passage through wood, plaster, or stone (up to 20 ft long, 5 ft wide, 8 ft tall).

title: Planar Binding
body:
# Planar Binding (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (jewel worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: 24 hours

Bind a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to your service if it fails Cha save.

title: Raise Dead
body:
# Raise Dead (5th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond worth 500 gp)
Duration: Instant

Return a creature that has been dead no longer than 10 days to life with 1 HP. Removes nonmagical diseases/poisons, but not missing body parts or old age.

title: Reincarnate
body:
# Reincarnate (5th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (rare oils worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Instant

Creates a new adult body for a dead humanoid. Soul enters new body if willing. DM rolls on reincarnation table for race.

title: Scrying
body:
# Scrying (5th-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (focus worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

title: Telekinesis

Casting Time: 1 action

body:

Range: 10 ft

body:

Range: Self
Components: V,S

Transport yourself and up to 8 willing creatures to a different plane. Unwilling creatures require a melee spell attack and Cha save.

Each creature in cone hit by a random ray (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, petrification, or banishment).

title: Amaunator (God)
body:
Amaunator, **Keeper of the Sun**, governs law and the steady march of daylight.

- Patron of magistrates and order.
- Associated with oaths, contracts, and the sun.

title: Asmodeus (God)
body:
Asmodeus, **Lord of the Nine**, is a god of tyranny and indulgence.

- Tempts mortals with deals.
- Cults hide in noble courts.

title: Auril (God)
body:
Auril, the **Frostmaiden**, embodies winter's cruelty.

- Demands offerings in the cold months.
- Feared across the North.

title: Azuth (God)
body:
Azuth, **the High One**, guides disciplined magic.

- Patron of wizards and spellcraft.
- Values study over chaos.

title: Bane (God)
body:
Bane, the **Black Hand**, is the god of tyranny.

- Commands conquest and fear.
- Favored by warlords.

title: Beshaba (God)
body:
Beshaba, **Lady of Misfortune**, brings ill luck.

- Her priests spread fear of bad omens.
- Twin and rival to Tymora.

title: Chauntea (God)
body:
Chauntea, the **Great Mother**, governs agriculture and life.

- Patron of farmers.
- Symbol of renewal.

title: Cyric (God)
body:
Cyric, the **Prince of Lies**, is god of strife and deception.

- Thrives on betrayal.
- Hated by many faiths.

title: Deneir (God)
body:
Deneir, **the Scribe of Oghma**, preserves written lore.

- Patron of cartographers and scribes.
- Seeks to record truth.

title: Eldath (God)
body:
Eldath, **the Quiet One**, is goddess of peace and pools.

- Promotes nonviolence.
- Sacred groves calm tempers.

title: Finder Wyvernspur (God)
body:
Finder, **the Nameless Bard**, inspires creation and reinvention.

- Patron of bards and innovators.
- Embraces new art from old forms.

title: Gond (God)
body:
Gond, **Wonderbringer**, exalts craft and invention.

- Patron of artisans and tinkers.
- Encourages experimentation.

title: Gwaeron Windstrom (God)
body:
Gwaeron, **the Tracker Who Never Fails**, guides rangers.

- Master of trails and beasts.
- Ally of Mielikki.

title: Helm (God)
body:
Helm, **the Vigilant One**, is god of guardianship.

- Patron of sentinels and watchmen.
- Duty above all.

title: Hoar (God)
body:
Hoar, **the Doombringer**, embodies poetic justice.

- Patron of vengeance and duels.
- Oaths paid in kind.

title: Ilmater (God)
body:
Ilmater, **the Broken God**, is patron of endurance and mercy.

- Comforts the suffering.
- Inspires self-sacrifice.

title: Istishia (God)
body:
Istishia, **the Water Lord**, is the sea and flowing change.

- Revered by sailors.
- Embraces transformation.

title: Kelemvor (God)
body:
Kelemvor, **Lord of the Dead**, judges souls fairly.

- Opposes undeath.
- Keeps death orderly.

title: Kossuth (God)
body:
Kossuth, **the Firelord**, is purifying flame.

- Trials by fire.
- Revered by elementalists.

title: Lathander (God)
body:
Lathander, the **Morninglord**, heralds dawn and renewal.

- Patron of new beginnings.
- Favored by artists and healers.

title: Leira (God)
body:
Leira, **Mistress of the Mists**, cloaks truth in illusion.

- Patron of secrets and masks.
- Truth is mutable.

title: Lliira (God)
body:
Lliira, **Lady of Joy**, celebrates freedom and festivity.

- Holy days are dances.
- Opposes oppression.

title: Loviatar (God)
body:
Loviatar, **Maiden of Pain**, exalts suffering and discipline.

- Patron of punishers.
- Pain as devotion.

title: Malar (God)
body:
Malar, **the Beastlord**, revels in the savage hunt.

- Predator over prey.
- Blood rites in the wilds.

title: Mask (God)
body:
Mask, **Lord of Shadows**, is patron of thieves.

- Stealth, guile, and luck.
- Shadows conceal truth.

title: Mielikki (God)
body:
Mielikki, **Our Lady of the Forest**, protects the wild.

- Patron of rangers.
- Hunts for balance.

title: Milil (God)
body:
Milil, **Lord of Song**, exalts poetry and music.

- Patron of performers.
- Beauty as truth.

title: Myrkul (God)
body:
Myrkul, **the Lord of Bones**, is dread inevitability.

- Whispers of tombs.
- Feared by common folk.

title: Mystra (God)
body:
Mystra, **Lady of Mysteries**, embodies the Weave.

- Patron of spellcasters.
- Magic must be guarded.

title: Oghma (God)
body:
Oghma, **Binder of What Is Known**, is knowledge itself.

- Patron of lorekeepers.
- Ideas seek expression.

title: Red Knight (God)
body:
The Red Knight, **Lady of Strategy**, guides battlefield tactics.

- Patron of officers.
- War as disciplined art.

title: Savras (God)
body:
Savras, **the All-Seeing**, governs divination.

- Patron of seers.
- Truth through visions.

title: Selune (God)
body:
Selûne, **Our Lady of Silver**, is the moon's grace.

- Protector of travelers.
- Eternal foe of Shar.

title: Shar (God)
body:
Shar, **Mistress of the Night**, keeps loss and secrets.

- Temples hide in shadow.
- Rival to Selûne.

title: Sharess (God)
body:
Sharess, **the Dancing Lady**, revels in joy and sensuality.

- Festivals and pleasure.
- Freedom of the self.

title: Shaundakul (God)
body:
Shaundakul, **the Rider of the Winds**, aids travelers.

- Portals and wayfinding.
- Patron of explorers.

title: Siamorphe (God)
body:
Siamorphe, **Heir to Nobility**, binds power to responsibility.

- Right rule as sacred duty.
- Chastens decadent nobles.

title: Silvanus (God)
body:
Silvanus, **the Oak Father**, is the wild made divine.

- Patron of druids.
- Keeps nature in balance.

title: Sune (God)
body:
Sune, **Lady Firehair**, celebrates beauty and love.

- Patron of art and romance.
- Beauty as sacred.

title: Talona (God)
body:
Talona, **Lady of Poison**, spreads disease and rot.

- Feared by healers.
- Plagues as portents.

title: Talos (God)
body:
Talos, **the Storm Lord**, is destructive fury.

- Thunderheads as omens.
- Wreckers praise him.

title: Tempus (God)
body:
Tempus, **Lord of Battles**, honors valor and skill.

- Patron of soldiers.
- War as crucible.

title: Torm (God)
body:
Torm, **the Loyal Fury**, swears to duty and courage.

- Patron of paladins.
- Sacrifice for the good.

title: Tymora (God)
body:
Tymora, **Lady Luck**, smiles on bold hearts.

- Patron of gamblers.
- Fortune favors risk.

title: Tyr (God)
body:
Tyr, **the Even-Handed**, is justice made steel.

- Courts and codes.
- Blind but fair.

title: Umberlee (God)
body:
Umberlee, **the Bitch Queen**, rules the cruel sea.

- Sailors appease her.
- Shipwrecks are tithe.

title: Valkur (God)
body:
Valkur, **the Mighty**, is luck and courage at sea.

- Patron of captains.
- Ride the gale.

title: Velsharoon (God)
body:
Velsharoon, **the Vaunted**, codifies necromancy.

- Liches and scholars.
- Power from death.

title: Waukeen (God)
body:
Waukeen, **the Merchant’s Friend**, blesses trade.

- Coin flows as lifeblood.
- Patron of peddlers.

title: Akadi (God)
body:
Akadi, **Queen of Air**, is freedom on the wind.

- Sky, breath, and motion.
- Change without chains.

title: Grumbar (God)
body:
Grumbar, **the Earthlord**, is endurance and stone.

- Oaths unyielding.
- Mountains remember.

title: Ubtao (God)
body:
Ubtao, **Father of Dinosaurs**, shaped Chult.

- Labyrinthine paths.
- Spirits of the jungle.

title: Uthgar (God)
body:
Uthgar, **the Battle Father**, patron of Uthgardt tribes.

- Totem spirits lead clans.
- Strength proves right.

title: Lolth (God)
body:
Lolth, **Spider Queen**, rules drow and webs.

- Treachery as virtue.
- Dark below dark.

title: Eilistraee (God)
body:
Eilistraee, **Dark Maiden**, offers drow redemption.

- Moonlit dances.
- Blade and song.

title: Ghaunadaur (God)
body:
Ghaunadaur, **That Which Lurks**, loves oozes and outcasts.

- Hunger without end.
- Forgotten caverns.

title: Lurue (God)
body:
Lurue, **the Unicorn Queen**, blesses wonder.

- Innocence and wild magic.
- Friends of fey.
